thread.title: Man Utd news: Eric Bailly wary of Watford's M'Baye Niang | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd news: Eric Bailly wary of Watford's M'Baye Niang | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: Eric Bailly wary of Watford's M'Baye Niang | Metro News
text:
Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 2:18 pm Eric Bailly admits United need to watch M’Baye Niang ‘closely’. (Getty Images) 
Eric Bailly admits Manchester United will need to keep a close eye on M’Baye Niang during the clash with Watford on Saturday. 
The 22-year-old joined the Hornets on loan from AC Milan in January and has made an immediate impact by scoring a goal and registering an assist in the 2-1 win over Burnley last weekend. 
‘He’s a good French forward, with extraordinary speed – we’ll watch him closely,’ Bailly told United’s official website. Bailly is wary of Niang’s ‘extraordinary speed’. (AMA/Getty Images) 
‘He forms a great partnership with [Troy] Deeney, who is strong and very experienced and brings a lot to his team. 
‘For me, they will form a deadly attack duo, so we’ll be very careful because they’re a very difficult team to play against.’
